content.raw:
The current [Modify Environment](http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=drcsim_modify_world&cat=drcsim) tutorial for DRCSim is suffering from a vestigial structure. Currently it looks like this:

1. roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas.launch
2. Spawn some objects
3. Save the SDF
4. Edit the SDF to delete the Atlas model
5. Edit the SDF to delete any <state></state> tags

I'd like to update it for 4.2 so that the new instructions are more like:

1. Open an empty world (gazebo)
2. Spawn some objects
3. Save the objects
4. Edit the SDF to include the Atlas model
5. Use any necessary launchfiles to launch Atlas
